column2: not available for a specific reference period

The Population Center Unique Identifier (PCUID) is one of the Dissemination Geography Unique Identifiers (DGUID) at Statistics Canada. The DGUID is a skeleton key for linking geospatial data and statistical data. It facilitates linking every geographic area maintained by Statistics Canada with data tables that use geographic names within Common Output Database Repository (CODR).

column1: How to cite: Statistics Canada. Table 33-10-0398-01  Real-time Local Business Condition Index (RTLBCI)
